laboratory_examinations.findings: IgE antibodies specific to kiwi, banana, chestnut, avocado were <0.35 kU/l; latex 2.07 kU/l and azufaifa 0.37 kU/l.
The test showed unremarkable bronchial hyperreactivity (PC20=0.093 mg/ml).

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Spirometry and peak expiratory flow (PEFR) measurements
laboratory_examinations.findings: The provocation with mitoxantrone induced a 15% fall in forced expiratory volume (FEV1) at 1 h, with a 20% decrease 4 h later.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreasing FEV1 after provocation with mitoxantrone.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Significant increase in lymphocytes and neutrophil proportion was observed, especially at 18 h after the challenge, eosinophil influx up to 4%, and more than a two-fold increase in permeability index (from 8.0% before to 18.2%).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increase in lymphocytes and neutrophils over time; eosinophils increased and permeability index more than doubled.
